metadata.description:
Collects X-Force: Shatterstar (2005) #1-4, New Mutants #99-100.

After his reunion with X-Force, Shatterstar finds himself fighting for his life on the island of Madripoor. How does he come into possession of the Five Fingers of Annihilation, and who else sought to control its terrible power?
metadata.name: X-Force: Shatterstar
